thread.title: Man in critical condition after car hits tree in Palmerston North
thread.title_full: Man in critical condition after car hits tree in Palmerston North

title: Man in critical condition after car hits tree in Palmerston North
text:
Man in critical condition after car hits tree in Palmerston North Last updated 11:40, February 4 2017 DANIEL DAVIDSON 
A crash on Ruahine St in Palmerston North has left one man critically injured. 
A man is in critical condition at Palmerston North Hospital after a car crashed into a tree. 
Emergency services were called to Ruahine St, between Winsor St and Linmor Place, in Palmerston North after a Subaru ran into a tree at 8am. 
Traffic was diverted around the scene while fire fighters worked to free an injured man trapped in the car. 
A St John Ambulance spokesman said the man was then taken to hospital in a critical condition. 
Police have been taking statements from witnesses to help the Serious Crash Unit's investigation into what caused the smash, a police spokesman said.
